casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Jason C. Johnson No. 2P13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Jason C. Johnson, for Johnson, Jason C. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of September 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Swain County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Ervin, J. recused

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of September 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Ervin, J. recused
